overview: Enter the space between dreams and reality, as a writer of erotic fantasies, Claudia Chase, takes you on a journey through her most intimate secrets. Escape to the French Riveria and be seduced by a beautiful blonde temptress. Experience the wonder of three women plunging to the depths of their sexuality by the pool of a quaint villa. Envelope yourself in the soft touch of two shaven slender nymphs who allow you to penetrate their private soiree.
tagline: Beautiful women, wonderful music, incredible locations, and hot, steamy sex
title: Day Dreamer
